content.question: Which of the following contributed most directly to an increase in trade along the routes on the map?

choices.label: The expansion of empires such as Mali in West Africa
The expansion of the Mongol Empire across Eurasia
The start of the Protestant Reformation in western Europe
The completion of the Christian Reconquista of Spain

content.answer: The expansion of empires such as Mali in West Africa

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
